thank_you_description.part_1: We appreciate your time and interest,

description.line_1: Thank you for applying. We will evaluate your application
description.line_2: and will contact you about what's next

term_description: You must agree to terms and conditions

slider.description: For this process you will have to perfom some steps:

rules.part_1: You will need about 30’ to fill out this application

part_2.l1: You will have 2’ to record your answers and only

rules.part_3: If you have any problems in between and you can’t finish your application, write to your recluter, explain what happened and you will get a new application form to re-do it

sub-title.line_1: Remember that you will have 2' to

rules.line_1: Make sure you have a stable internet connection.
rules.line_2: Feel comfortable and free to express yourself as you wish.
rules.line_3: The questions will be shown ones you start each video.
rules.line_4: Check your videos and continue if you’re sure with the result

line_2.p1: We invite you to use the upper
line_2.p2: menu or return to the main page
